body.name: VAL CUCINA Infrared Heating Air Fryer Toaster Oven, Extra Large Countertop Convection Oven 10-in-1 Combo, 6-Slice Toast, Enamel Baking Pan Easy Clean with Recipe Book, Brushed Stainless Steel Finish
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins
features: [INFRARED HEATING + TRUE CONVECTION AIR FRY] Our cutting-edge technology features a powerful and effective heat radiation system, coupled with a high-velocity heated-air circulation, which results in a quick and deliciously flavorful brown crust while preventing food from becoming overcooked or dried out. It ensures that the interior of food remains tender and juicy, stays succulent and moist up to 35%, providing a perfect balance of texture and taste.

[SUPER VERSATILE “10-in-1” AIR FRYER CONVECTION TOASTER OVEN] Unlike typical air fryer or oven with a single function, we take it up a notch by offering 10 preset digital functions that include Air Fry, Toast, Bake, Broil, Roast, Reheat, Warm, Slow Cook, and Dehydrate. This versatile 10-in-1 combination allows you to prepare a variety of dishes with ease and convenience, making your cooking experience more enjoyable than ever before.

[FAMILY & PARTY SIZE CAPACITY] VAL CUCINA stands out on the market with a 30%-60% larger capacity. You can easily roast a 5-6lb chicken, toast 6 slices of bread, cook a large batch of French fries, 20 chicken wings, or bake a 12-inch pizza, all in one go. This larger capacity is perfect for families, entertaining, or meal prepping, making it a versatile and essential addition to any kitchen

[CRUNCHY and HEALTHY COOKING EXPERIENCE]Our Air Fry feature is a healthier alternative to traditional frying, reducing fat by up to 75%. Enjoy all your favorite foods guilt-free, including deep-fried favorites like fries. With intensive and efficient infrared heating combined with true convection, our air fryer toaster oven delivers perfectly crispy and golden results every time. This delivers an exquisite blend of texture and flavor, ensuring a superb culinary experience.

[FAST, SAFE & EASY to USE] With 1750W of power and six heating elements, the VAL CUCINA Air Fryer toaster oven cooks 40% faster than traditional ovens. The even distribution of heat reduces preheating time by up to 30%, saving your valuable time in the kitchen. Our user-friendly digital display and analogue controls make cooking effortless and enjoyable. VAL CUCINA countertop oven boasts a variety of accessories: an Enamel Baking Tray, Wire Rack, Air Fryer Basket, Crumb Tray.
body.description: VAL CUCINA 10 IN 1 XL Air Fryer Toaster Oven 10 Cooking Presets with Infrared Heating + True Convection AirFry The infrared heating is more concentrated energy waves and radiant heat at far higher temperatures, infrared grills cook extremely quickly due to intense and efficient heat, minimizing the grilling time and preventing “drying out” of the meat. Then, is to sear the outside and produce a flavorful brown crust while ensuring that the interior remains tender and juicy. Infrared Heating Elements True Convection AirFry LCD Display + Control Buttons + Switching Knobs 6 Heating Elements 10 Cooking Presets High-Velocity FAN 3 Rack Positions Interior Oven Light

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q:What kind of heating elements does this use, and how many of them? A:There are 6 heating elements (4 on the top and 2 on the bottom). Among them, top-front and top-rear are golden Infrared elements. Q: How do you turn the oven off? A: Press the START/PAUSE button to stop the operation, and hold the button for another 3 seconds to turn off the oven. The oven beeps 3 times and display goes off. Q:What is the material of the baking tray? A:The baking tray is made of Galvanized steel sheet with non-stick enamel coating , easy to clean after using. Q:Whether there is a choice for slices and darkness level of toast? A: Turn the SELECT knob to increase or decrease the number of slices which ranges from "1" to "6", the shade of toast you can customized the darkness level. The time and temperature are set automatically according number of slices and darkness level.

About Us Kitchen is the center of the family, and where we celebrate, cheer and share our life journey. Passion for research begins at Milano, Italy. VAL CUCINA has been focused on design, technology and user experience in household appliances for years. VAL CUCINA brings bold Italian style with modern features to the kitchen, so you can count on perfect cooking experience every time. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Retro style & High Quality performance
reviews.reviewText: This is a very high quality oven I rate the looks and performance higher than my Breville Pro oven. Not only does it have a great retro classic style but it’s built with the highest quality and performs as expected! The infrared heating elements are a step above my Breville oven. I do not see it getting too hot or the fan being too loud, as others noted in reviews; but I have not used the air fryer setting yet.I feel the fan is very quiet 🤫 even after it’s completed the cycle.I highly recommend for appearance, stability, ease of use and it cleans up with no issues.I also like it was Italian designed which shows with the workmanship and overall quality.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and good function
reviews.reviewText: Just opened the box of the oven and it is amazing. It is good-looking and easy to use. I used it for some toast and it works well. I have an air fryer and a microwave oven and now I think I can use this machine instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love hate relationship
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore this air fryer. It fits wonderfully with my colors on my kitchen and it is very easy to use. It roasts quick, air fries in a pinch, bakes, and so on. I am using it every day. But it starts randomly beeping which drives me nuts. I have not figured out what it is I am forgetting but after it’s off for a little while it starts beeping. And maybe after 30 minutes again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been very pleased with my purchase. It’s attractive and doesn’t take up more space than my toaster oven. It toasts evenly, unlike other toaster ovens I’ve had.The air fryer works well and provides ample space for food.I also dehydrated tomatoes, and although it’s time consuming, it did a great job.So far, the only other function I’ve use is reheat and it does heat evenly.I have it a few days short of one month and consider it a great addition to my kitchen!Word to the wise - you MUST read the booklet in order to know how to use the various functions properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update to previous review
reviews.reviewText: Updating my review again...I am pleased to notice that after my initial review complaining of the inaccurate color description, not only does the following review update apply, but the seller actually renamed the color description from Black Stainless to Metallic Gray. Awesome that they cared enough to do that, and I do believe that is an accurate description of the color.I am updating my previous review of this product for 3 reasons.1. The seller went above and beyond to earn our satisfaction. They genuinely wanted us to be pleased with their product and they did not make any excuses, just wanted to resolve the issue if possible. Due to the fact that our issue was with color/description rather than actual product performance, we decided to keep the product to see how it actually performs.2. Upon rereading the description of color, I am wondering if the issue was more of a language or wording issue, versus outright incorrect color description. The product stated it was Black Stainless. We have other Black Stainless appliances, so assumed this would be the same color. But now I believe that the seller meant Black AND Stainless vs Black Stainless, as the sides are black and the front is regular stainless. So perhaps more of an accident with wording. Despite being initially disappointed that it wasn't colored as expected, it is a classy looking little machine.3. We have used the oven 7 or 8 times and actually are very pleased with its operation. It cooks quickly and evenly and we have no complaints with it thus far. We haven't used all the functions, but toast and airfry get 5/5 stars so far.Changing my overall review to 5 stars because we are very pleased with the oven's cooking ability as well as the excellent customer service.Thanks Val Cucina!Original post:We ordered this Val Cucina Air Fryer Toaster Oven in black stainless steel because our other appliances are black stainless steel and this product had good user reviews. BE AWARE that despite the fact that this is called a Black Stainless Steel product, only the sides and top are black stainless. The entire front is regular stainless steel color. And since the front of the product is the majority of what you see, it completely clashes with our other black stainless steel appliances. So very frustrating given that the color was 90% of the reason we ordered this product. It is going straight back to Amazon. Not even going to plug it in. Extremely disappointed in the deceptive color name of this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love it, no longer need a microwave. It can really do it all and it is a nice good size and simple to use. Cooks quickly and looks nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect kitchen addition
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome product - I love that it has such versatility. We use it for everything. It is so easy to use and makes meals easy as well. The design is also aesthetically pleasing—a great addition to any kitchen. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this oven, air fryer, toaster combination.
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use and clean. It is attractive to sit on your counter. So far I have used the toaster and the air fryer. I like my toast almost burned, and it is much quicker than my old toaster/oven to get that crunchy toast for my avocado toast in the morning. I have an older air fryer, however this new air fryer really works much better. The food again cooks more quickly. It seems that with the drip tray inside the oven compartment - and easy to see - it will be much easier to keep clean. All in all I REALLY like this product.
